newsitem.title: USA: Texas Utilities files $500 mln shelf.
newsitem.headline: Texas Utilities files $500 mln shelf.

text.p: Two business trusts formed by Texas Utilities Co said Wednesday it filed a shelf registration with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell up to $500 million in preferred securities.

The trust know as TU Electric Capital IV and TU Electric Capital V will use the proceeds from the sale of the culumative quarterly income preferred securities to invest in junior subordinated debentures.
The preferred securities have a liquidation amount of $25 per preferred security, the filing said.

Net proceeds from the sale of the series D debentures will be used by the company for general corporate purposes, which may include the acquisition of outstanding securities of the company, the filing said.
The offering will be made through Goldman, Sachs & Co, the filing said.
